nodes.text: The Galactic Center Spaceport was located on the galactic capital planet Coruscant. In 44 ABY, the spaceport came under the control of the Lost Tribe of Sith, who had infiltrated the government. In that year, during the New Jedi Order's mission to liberate Coruscant from the Sith, the Jedi arrived at the Galactic Center Spaceport in the starliner Plain Lady.
